name: Neha Patel
details: Joban turned our raw ideas into a polished talent platform that teams actually enjoy using. He guides us through technical trade-offs, prototypes quickly, and always comes prepared with thoughtful suggestions for the user experience.

name: Ethan Miller
details: From the first sprint, Joban embedded himself with our analysts and translated their workflows into a fast, reliable dashboard. His attention to accessibility and testing dramatically reduced bugs and improved stakeholder trust.

name: Sara Al-Khalid
details: Our new marketing site launched ahead of schedule and sign-ups jumped almost immediately. Joban gave us a maintainable CMS setup, automated reports, and clear documentation so our team can move quickly without breaking things.
